TopicTitle: Add-on to make antennas required for unmanned vehicles?

Articles.Content: I recall some Scott Manley thing where you needed to have an antenna to use a drone core, or something of the sort. Does anybody know which mod this is?

The game already allows this as of version 1.2.  By default you can use SAS, full and zero throttle, plus the right click menus with "limited probe control", but WASD and fine throttle require a connection to KSC.  In the difficulty settings the game has a toggle to require a connection to KSC for ANY probe control as well.  There is also a toggle for Enable Comm Network which makes all the control stuff active, so make sure it is toggled too.

The CommNet available in KSP is a decent analogue, but if you want a more realistic version, requiring multiple antennas, power for said antennas at all times and comms delay based on distance from the controller (usually KSC, but local control is possible with a command ship), then you want Remote Tech.  This is probably what Scott Manley was using.

Edited November 7, 2018 by overkill13

Thanks. I think that's it.

I'm using 1.1.3 because I just came back to KSP, tried to get the latest version and add all my mods, but for some reason it isn't loading, just giving me a black screen.

Well that was a lot of clicking through Github to get to what version I needed.

45 minutes ago, PTGFlyer said:

tried to get the latest version and add all my mods, but for some reason it isn't loading, just giving me a black screen.

Install it stock, verify it works.  Then install your mods one by one, verifying that you have the right version for your version of the game and all of the dependencies are installed.

You're not on a 32bit computer, are you?  The latest version is 64 bit only.

You're not on a 32bit computer, are you?  The latest version is 64 bit only.

64bit.

24 minutes ago, PTGFlyer said:

What makes 1.4 better than 1.1? I'm not getting Making History, so that's irrelevant. ﻿

I can't say much about 1.1 vs 1.4, as I started with 1.3 and have played 1.3.1 for most of my time.  But, as point of interest, you just asked about a mod to do something that was made stock awhile ago.  I only suggested you install it and the mods one at a time, since the fact that you tried it at all implied you wanted to update.

 

There's nothing wrong with sticking with an older version, I wasn't saying you had to upgrade.  But it might be a good idea to mention it in your OP when asking for support since you're 4 major releases behind what's current.

5 minutes ago, PTGFlyer said:

Thanks. Might update. How hard is it to move a save file?

Literally as easy as copying and pasting the folder.  KSP Folder/game/saves/folderwithnameofyoursave

Just copy the whole thing.  If everything blows up on load your original won't be touched.

Remember you can install the two versions at the same time (Just in different folders) and your operating system won't know the difference.  I have like... somewhere between 8 and 12 installs right now.
